title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 54 - Variable Life Insurance
content:

State Regulations
§ 54.1 - Definitions
§ 54.2 - Qualifications of insurance companies to issue variable life insurance policies
§ 54.3 - Separate accounts
§ 54.4 - Investment policy
§ 54.5 - Filing and approval of variable life insurance policies
§ 54.6 - Insurance policy requirements
§ 54.7 - Policy value and cash surrender value
§ 54.8 - Reserve liabilities
§ 54.9 - Information furnished to applicants
§ 54.10 - Applications
§ 54.11 - Reports to policyholders
§ 54.12 - Authorized foreign and alien insurance companies
§ 54.13 - Separability provision
§ 54.14 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 54

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 3201, 4240; Financial Services Law, §§ 202, 301, 302; L. 2000, ch. 505; L. 2002, ch. 13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
